title: How to: Dakbokkeumtang | Use Wine & Mirim For Deep, Balanced Flavor | Korean Spicy Chicken Stew!
description:

Today, we present another way to make Dakbokkeumtang (Korean Spicy Chicken Stew). We'll use a base mixture of white wine and mirim (rice wine), along with gochugaru and gochujang to create an amazing braising sauce. The taste is tremendous! We're excited to share with you the recipe! 

Dakbokkeumtang is similar to dakdoritang in taste but typically has less sauce (more like a curry consistency). Get the rice ready!
